properties.name: signUpUrl
properties.description: Url of an endpoint for users to sign up.

properties.name: tokenSecret
properties.description: Private code used to build tokens.

properties.name: minUsernameLen
properties.description: Users with username shorter than this are not allowed.

properties.name: maxUsernameLen
properties.description: Users with username longer than this are not allowed.

properties.name: recordsPerPage
properties.description: Defines parameter for user content pagination.

properties.name: evaluatorsPerBlock
properties.description: Defines number of evaluators loaded in one block (when user wants to know who liked a specified record..

properties.name: commentsPerBlock
properties.description: How name comments are displayed in a block.

properties.name: followersPerBlock
properties.description: How many followers are loaded at a time.

properties.name: digestPageSize
properties.description: The number of the most recent records displayed as a digest.

properties.name: searchPageSize
properties.description: The number of records or publishers returned on client's query.
